details:
* [CVE-2015-8472](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2015-8472)
update incomplete patch for [CVE-2015-8126](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2015-8126)
* [CVE-2015-8540](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2015-8540)
underflow read in png\_check\_keyword in pngwutil.c
* [CVE-2012-3425](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2012-3425)
The png\_push\_read\_zTXt function in pngpread.c in libpng 1.0.x
 before 1.0.58, 1.2.x before 1.2.48, 1.4.x before 1.4.10, and
 1.5.x before 1.5.10 allows remote attackers to cause a denial
 of service (out-of-bounds read) via a large avail\_in field value
 in a PNG image.
